name: Dead Realm
description: Ghosts prey on the living inside the haunted mansion of a long dead electricity tycoon. Dead Realm is a creepy, multiplayer action game with beautiful, immersive environments. You can play as either a Ghost or a Human character and work with your friends to run, hide, surviveâ€¦ or die.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTX DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5-3470 3.2GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 660 GTX DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
